attributes.title: Horrible
attributes.review: I thought this app was gonna be good but after a while, my iPad started to crash and the battery was going low fast.nobody should download an app that decreases ur battery quick and starts crashing.

attributes.title: Donâ€™t download this!
attributes.review:
As I was downloading the Trump 2020 app(which took 6 months) weird things began to happen.

At the end of a quiet road, there was my house. It was late at night when I hear my phone rang.

Hello?â€

â€œ Iâ€™m going to kill you,â€  a man with a deep and annoying voice said.

â€œWho is this?â€ I asked.

No answer.

â€œWho is this?â€ I repeated, my hand trembling.

There was a click. Silence. I quickly dialled the police and explained what had happened. The officer told me to wait while he traced the call. After a few moments he said, â€œThe call is coming from . . . inside The White House.â€

â€œThat doesnâ€™t make sense,â€ I said. â€œHow could someone so racist be in the White House?â€

â€œHe probably broke in,â€ he said.

â€œOh yeah, I guess that makes sense.â€

â€œAnd thatâ€™s not everything,â€ he said. â€œIâ€™m not a police officer.â€

â€œYou arenâ€™t?â€

â€œNo, Iâ€™m the future president of 2020 from before. I never actually left or got arrested .â€

â€œBut I heard you got convicted.â€

The man made a clicking sound with his mouth. â€œAnd?â€ he said.

â€œWow, thatâ€™s really good.â€

â€œThanks.â€

â€œSo, are you really in the White House ?â€

â€œYeah, totally.â€

â€œWhere?â€

The manâ€™s breathing grew heavier. â€œI like your hair,â€ he said.

â€œWait, you can see me?â€

â€œYes.â€

â€œWait, you like my hair?â€

â€œItâ€™s really nice.â€

â€œIf you can see me, then what am I wearing?â€

â€œLooks like a blouse from Banana and a skirt from . . . Anne Taylor Loft?â€

â€œWow, you really can see me.â€

â€œI can also seeâ€”wait, what the hell is that?â€

â€œWhat?â€

â€œThereâ€™s a person, a ghost hovering near you.â€

â€œItâ€™s sort of hard to trust you after the click thing.â€

â€œNo Iâ€™m serious, over by the couch.â€

I turned and gasped, â€œOh my god, I see it! I knew you were crazy and not a good president.â€

â€œJesus Christ. Is it an old person? Eww, heâ€™s all translucent.â€

â€œLooks like a boomer.â€

â€œWhat does he want??â€

â€œI think he wants to vote. Heâ€™s holding a â€˜Make America Great Againâ€™ sign.â€

The ghost man floated closer and spoke: â€œVote for meeeeee.â€

â€œOh my God, he can talk!â€ the man said.

â€œVote for meeeeee,â€ the ghost man repeated.

â€œUm, no thank you!â€ the man said.

â€œHe canâ€™t hear you,â€ the I said.

â€œPut me on speaker.â€

â€œHold on,â€ she said. â€œTry now.â€

â€œWe donâ€™t want to vote for you! O.K., junior? Just run along.â€

â€œWhy?â€ the old dusty ghost man said, cocking his head to one side. â€œVoting is fun.â€

â€œNo it isnâ€™t!â€ the man yelled .

â€œWho are you?â€ the ghost man asked me. â€œWhy are you in my house?â€

â€œOh, Iâ€™m Yassy. I actually live in this house now. And the voice youâ€™re hearing on the phone is . . . I didnâ€™t get your name.â€

â€œItâ€™s, uh, Douglas,â€ he said, reluctantly.

â€œDouglas is hiding somewhere in here to kill me, right, Douglas?â€ I said.

â€œThat was the plan,â€ Douglas said .

â€œAnd you guys are scared of a man with a sign Jesus,â€ the ghost man said.

â€œA Cheeto man with a sign!â€ Douglas said.

There was a heavy silence for several moments. Suddenly, the doorbell rang.

â€œExpecting someone?â€ Douglas asked.

It rang again. I walked over and opened it. Standing there was a hulking man in a all black suit, barely concealing a bloodied machete behind his back.

â€œPardon me, Maâ€™am,â€ he said. â€œMy car broke down and I was wondering if I could charge my phone in your house?â€

â€œSorry, I donâ€™t think so,â€ I said, starting to close the door.

The man shoved his foot inside. â€œWell, I do think so,â€ he said.

I stumbled and fell to the ground.

â€œWho the hell is that?â€ Douglas screamed.

â€œIâ€™m a homicidal drifter. Who the hell are you?â€ the drifter said, confused. â€œWhereâ€™s that voice coming from?â€

â€œHeâ€™s a killer hiding in my house,â€ I said, holding up the phone. â€œDouglas.â€

â€œHiding? Where?â€ the drifter asked, looking around nervously.

â€œHeâ€™s in the closet,â€ the ghost man said.

â€œWhat in the hEcC is that?â€ the drifter screamed.

â€œIâ€™m a ghost. I used to be the president like 4 years ago.Oh, and let me guess, you donâ€™t want to vote for me.â€

â€œHell, no, I donâ€™t want to vote for you. Whatâ€™s going on in here?â€

â€œWhatâ€™s going on is no one will vote for me!â€

â€œFor Christâ€™s sake, no oneâ€™s voting for you at night,â€ Douglas shouted. â€œGive it up!â€

The ghost man began to cry.

â€œNow you made him cry, Douglas,â€ I chided.

â€œSorry if Iâ€™m a little on edge because you let a killer into the house,â€ Douglas said.

â€œFirst of all, I didnâ€™t let him in, he busted in,â€ I said.

â€œItâ€™s true, I did,â€ the drifter said.

â€œSecond of all, youâ€™re also a killer, Douglas.â€

â€œTouchÃ©,â€ the drifter said.

â€œAnd third of all, donâ€™t say sorry to me, say sorry to the dead kid.â€

â€œO.K., O.K. Iâ€™m sorry. I shouldnâ€™t have snapped at you,â€ Douglas said.

The ghost man smiled. Everyone seemed to calm down a bit, until the doorbell rang again. I walked toward the door.

â€œDONâ€™T!â€ the three others shouted.

I opened it and peered outside. There was no one there, just a large wooden box on the front step.

â€œThereâ€™s a box out here,â€ I said. â€œThereâ€™s no label or anything,â€

â€œI have a bad feeling about this box,â€ the drifter said.

â€œI hate the blacks- I mean the box,â€ the ghost man said.

I ignored them and carried it inside. I turned to the drifter. â€œMay I?â€ He wiped his machete on his pants and handed it to me. I popped open the top, reached in, and pulled out a tattered clown doll with a sinister grin.

â€œWhat is it? What is it?â€ Douglas yelled, through the phone.

â€œSome sort of clown doll,â€ I said.

â€œI donâ€™t want to play with a clown doll,â€ the ghost man said, beginning to cry.

â€œWhy donâ€™t we just put this thing back in the box before it gives us all nightmares, O.K.?â€ the drifter said.

â€œLook, thereâ€™s a string,â€ I said, pulling it before anyone could object. The clown began to wheeze, its eyes shifted from side to side, and an eerily cheerful song emanated from its open mouth.

At that moment the ghost Cheeto man eyes turned red and he kill all three of us, The killer, the drifter, and I. Later I found out, all three were Donald J. Trump.

And thatâ€™s why Iâ€™m writing this review from my ghost phone to warn you about this app DONT DOWNLOAD IT!

attributes.title: Big Cheeto man killed my Hamster-R.I.P. Hammy â¤ï¸
attributes.review: When I opened the app the ugliest orange mongoose lookin egg McMuffin was staring at me with Cheeto lookin creep eyes(not to disrespect the Cheetos of the world) I got so distracted by the plop of orange hand sanitizer of a person on my screen that I tripped over my hamster and killed him.....R.I.P. Hammy this rating is so ur memory will live on forever â™¾ I did not enjoy this app what so ever.Period. I didnâ€™t know that a orange ğŸŠ could have a brain...oh wait he doesnâ€™t have one.He makes me sick to my stomach with his nasty spray tan and toupee.

attributes.review:
Tell me the duck story

The man said
"No, we just sell lemonade. But itâ€™s cold
And it's fresh
And itâ€™s all home-made. Can I get you a glass?"

â€œIâ€™ll pass.â€

Then he waddled away
